short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build Salesforce LWC development easy and fastest.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üíª How to use:
‚û°Ô∏è Login to salesforce and click the "Lightning Studio" icon (browser top-right corner [chrome extension standard icon-bar]) when the icon changes to blue color.
‚û°Ô∏è If installed for the first time, refresh the page before using.

üì∫ Features:
‚û°Ô∏è Create or update Apex, LMS, and LWC classes quickly.
‚û°Ô∏è Create a new file for a specific LWC component.
‚û°Ô∏è Quickly find code in LWC files and apex classes.
‚û°Ô∏è Diff Checker.
‚û°Ô∏è GraphQL Explorer.
‚û°Ô∏è Download and back up a component, specific file, or folder.
‚û°Ô∏è Download full zip backup of Lightning Web Components, Lightning Message Channel, and Apex Classes.
‚û°Ô∏è Delete components or individual files.

üôà Editor Experience: 
‚û°Ô∏è Quickly save (deploy) your changes by using 'CTRL+S'.
‚û°Ô∏è All LWC development snippets (shortcut keys) are available.
‚û°Ô∏è Dark and Light mode.
‚û°Ô∏è Editor color themes available.

üíªMore Details: https://nisar-99.github.io/Lightning-Studio
